Posts.EditableText: To change a property, you use: property <#object#;property=value[;property[b:2alhrqlp]N[/b:2alhrqlp]=value[b:2alhrqlp]N[/b:2alhrqlp]]> I'm not sure exactly how it's like in QDK. There should be a little property changing demo in my quest demo archive: http://www.compwhizz.freeserve.co.uk/asldemos/ There's a function and property demo. (func&prop.asl) May help you out.. To change a property, you use:
property <#object#;property=value[;propertyN=valueN]>

I'm not sure exactly how it's like in QDK.
